attributes.review: This app doesn’t work, it doesn’t do any of what the description said it would. It just made my ears go deaf and now I have a bald spot. I would recommend this app to people who would like a bald spot, extreme headaches, explosive diarrhea, being deaf in the right ear, every animal to hate you, and seven extra chromosomes. Personally, the side effects aren’t my thing. I regret ever downloading this app.
attributes.title: If I could give it zero stars I would

attributes.review: when i downloaded the app, i thought i was going to be greeted by our beautiful😻 orange 🍊god but i was sadly mistaken😿. i was greeted by a man in a mask👺 saying if i didn’t give him my address, i would be deported👿. so i gave him my address and the next day, he was banging on my door🚪. i opened it and asked him what he wanted. he told me to let him in and held up a gun🔫🔪. i asked him to please spare me but he shot me🎯.i immediately ran to my phone 📱 and tried to delete the app, but there was a virus 🦠 and my phone exploded 💥. and then i laid there and imagined our orange 🍊 god👼🏻. then as i drew my last breath 💨, i saw him 👦🏻. donald j trump, holding a gun 🔫. and he said”i’m here to finish you” and he shot 🩸 me one ☝️ more time.
attributes.title: i got mudered 😱 🦋👄🦋

attributes.review: Tiktok teaches me more about chemistry than all of my school lives combined. It keeps me informed and is helping me get through the pandemic. It is my number one source for entrainment. It teaches me how to function in the society. The number one thing is that it shows me many ppl have the same problems as I do, I don’t feel as different. I thought I was the only one to scared to ask for a ketchup packet. Long live Tiktok.
attributes.title: Tiktok lives matter

attributes.review:
I wanted to support my president just like you others, but I heard so many horrible things that I just had to search the president up. You’ll never guess what I found.

He has multiple— yes MULTIPLE sexual assault cases against him; and he’s racist, homophobic, and transphobic. He’s taking away our FREEDOM OF SPEECH, which you Trump supporters care much about. On top of that, this app is sucky. 1/10. Would give 0 stars if I could. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Dang, really?

attributes.review:
I’M HERE TO SAVE ALL PEOPLE. So I came across this app of our amazing Oompa Loompa president 🟠👄🟠. Then I found out my pet shark was not a supporter for our big orange president. Then when my shark told me that I was thinking of all the bad things going on like corona, racism isn’t getting fixed yet , and the LGBTQ Community 🏳️‍🌈 isn’t getting treated right. And I noticed that our big amazing orange pig president just says “it’s a hoax” so this is why me and my pet shark don’t support our big fat orange 🍊 president. Periodt. 
👁👄👁

this app is so slow and bad and ugly it made my baby cousin say his first cuss word.... the smell of oranges coming through the screen alerted ants and the ants broke into my mf house!!!!!! and it was because of that stupid orange!!!!!! 😡😡
this one specific ant named pablo choked my baby cousin to death and wanted to kill my family because of the oranges...  and it was so bad, my phone pooped itself and technology itself wanted to be banned. i brought my cousin to the hospital. when he woke up, i showed him the app. he said that the orange guy on the front is so ugly and i said it's true. it was so ugly, it killed my baby cousin.. so you could basically say this app is so stupid it killed my baby cousin 🍊 rip lil fat rolls 😔🕊❤️✨
attributes.title: terrible app do not download

attributes.review: this is literally the worst app known to man, and how its still on the apple store is beyond me. this app is so glitchy, and the messages just spread hate. it clearly wasn't thought out well because its so confusing. its literally such a bad app I'd rather stick a fork in my eye then ever use this app again. literally horrible, one star from me ! this app supports racism and rapists and misogyny. nasty !! ONE STAR ONE STAR ONE STAR ! im traumatized from this disgusting app.
attributes.title: This app is trash

attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to be enlightened maybe even just a little bit, and yet I wasn’t enlightened at all this app was created for what reason exactly? If it wasn’t created to sway people to vote for trump, and yet even while I continued to sign up for the app there were multiple glitches that lead me to eventually deleting the app overall. Worst app ever made. Do not even waste your time.
attributes.title: This app was mortifying

attributes.review:
The app that the president has access to wanted my number 🤡bro I’m under age (sigh) but you know what I did.....🙃🧚🧚🏿✨💕 I eXITeD tHaT MOtherFu*kiNg aPp oK BecAUse I aInT supPOrTinG no RaciSt HoMophObic cOrn wItH soMe FeLT GluEd To hiS HeAd 🎉 p.s. baron if you see this u can still be a decent person when your 18 just don’t listen to your dad you only need four years till your out....also if your mom needs help tell her to say “Cheerio” on live television

attributes.title: No Cheeto 👎🥰

attributes.review: This app has no purpose. People should not download it. I didn’t even want to see he orange face again anyways 🍊💖. But this app was sooo glitchy I couldn’t even do anything on it. It took me to random websites that I didn’t even want to go to. It took me to a petition to vote for trump but who would vote for him again? I had the worst experience ever 😡. Overall this app is just the worst app in the world just like trump 🤢🍊💖✨🧚🏼‍♀️.
attributes.title: Worst app ever 🍊✨
